commit.message:
8259650: javax/swing/JComponent/7154030/bug7154030.java still fails with "Exception: Failed to hide opaque button"

Added delay of 1s before taking a first screenshot to let component
finish painting. After the fix the 100 runs of the test on all the
machines including the one that had this test failing is successful.
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/openjdk/jdk into openjdk-master
